content:
There is a issue from gForge http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=12508&start=0.

The example description is "This is the narrative for the resource. See also the XML or JSON format. This example conforms to the profile Sequence."
Sequence is a resource not profile, so it should be "This is the narrative for the resource. See also the XML or JSON format. This example conforms to the resource Sequence."

It points out the naming problem of description of every Sequence example. But I found out that it is existing in every resources' example. such as in ImagingStudy resource: http://build.fhir.org/imagingstudy-example.html.
Should we change this description content based on the gforge issue request?
please refer that task to FHIR publishing - that's not language that the individual committees can control
